article.title: Sensis to Modernize Key Components of Area Surveillance Radars
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Sensis Corporation has been awarded a contract with the Canadian Department of National Defense (DND) to refurbish a primary component of the DND's terminal radar and control system fleet of area surveillance radar. The Sensis solution will improve system reliability, maintainability and availability while extending the overall service life of the radars.
